rules_text:
Skip your draw step.
[i]Tabula Rasa[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, exile your hand and graveyard, then draw three cards
flavor_text:
[i]“She's lived so long, her ability to remember anything for long has been worn away. I don't think she's even aware of how much she's lost...”
—Marisa Kirisame[/i]
